## Data citation

Data were shared by and accessed from [Columbia River DART](http://www.cbr.washington.edu/dart/query/adult_graph_text) (Data Access in Real Time), accessed January 25, 2023.

## Load packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
library(tsibble) #make a dataframe
library(feasts) 
library(fable)
```

## Load data

```{r}
# load data from local file
fish_data <- read.csv(here("data", "willamette_fish_passage.csv")) |>
  clean_names()
```
